name: Spooky Boi Advance
description:
Thank you for purchasing our latest console, the Spooky Boi Advance!

Pre-loaded with 10 exciting games, scaling difficulty, and even a heckin' flashlight, you're sure to never run out of fun! Survive Beat 30 stages to win the prize: a sense of accomplishment!

USE SHIFT BUTTON ON KBM OR EAST BUTTON ON CONTROLLER TO CLOSE TUTORIAL MENU. TUTORIAL MENU WILL GET STUCK IF OPENED AFTER LOSING A GAME.
